General Queries.question: What is this platform about?
General Queries.answer: It's a one-stop solution for all your printing needs. We connect you with nearby printing stores and help you schedule and manage orders.

General Queries.question: How does this service work?
General Queries.answer: You simply select what you want to print, upload your file, choose a nearby store, and schedule a pickup or delivery.

General Queries.question: Is this service free?
General Queries.answer: Our platform is free to use. You only pay for the printing services provided by the store.

General Queries.question: Do I need to sign up to place an order?
General Queries.answer: Yes, signing up helps us offer a personalized experience and keep track of your orders.

General Queries.question: Where are your partner stores located?
General Queries.answer: Our AI maps stores near your location and ranks them based on quality, speed, and pricing.

AI & Store Recommendation.question: How does your platform choose stores for me?
AI & Store Recommendation.answer: We use AI algorithms based on distance, user reviews, turnaround time, pricing, and specialty.

AI & Store Recommendation.question: Can I manually select a printing store?
AI & Store Recommendation.answer: Yes, you can override the recommendations and select any partner store from the list.

AI & Store Recommendation.question: Can I favorite stores I like?
AI & Store Recommendation.answer: Absolutely! You can mark any store as a favorite for faster future bookings.

AI & Store Recommendation.question: How is store reliability measured?
AI & Store Recommendation.answer: Based on customer feedback, order completion rate, and quality consistency.

AI & Store Recommendation.question: What if I’m not happy with the AI recommendation?
AI & Store Recommendation.answer: You can always view the full list and sort/filter stores manually.

Printing Options.question: What can I print here?
Printing Options.answer: We support documents, photos, posters, brochures, ID cards, banners, and more.

Printing Options.question: Do you support color and black & white printing?
Printing Options.answer: Yes, both options are available depending on the store's capabilities.

Printing Options.question: Can I print double-sided?
Printing Options.answer: Yes, just enable the double-sided option while placing the order.

Printing Options.question: Can I print legal documents?
Printing Options.answer: Yes, but we recommend reviewing store terms before printing sensitive materials.

Printing Options.question: Do you offer bulk printing?
Printing Options.answer: Yes, many stores offer discounts for bulk orders.

File Upload & Formats.question: What file types are supported?
File Upload & Formats.answer: PDF, DOCX, PPT, PNG, JPEG, and TIFF are supported.

File Upload & Formats.question: Is there a file size limit?
File Upload & Formats.answer: Yes, each file can be up to 100MB. For larger files, contact support.

File Upload & Formats.question: Can I upload multiple files?
File Upload & Formats.answer: Yes, you can upload multiple documents in a single order.

File Upload & Formats.question: Is my file safe?
File Upload & Formats.answer: Yes, we use encryption and delete files automatically after order completion.

File Upload & Formats.question: Can I preview the print before confirming?
File Upload & Formats.answer: Yes, you’ll get a preview screen before payment.

Order Scheduling.question: How do I schedule my order?
Order Scheduling.answer: After selecting the store and printing preferences, you can choose a preferred pickup or delivery time.

Order Scheduling.question: Can I reschedule an order?
Order Scheduling.answer: Yes, up until the store confirms the order for printing.

Order Scheduling.question: How long does it take for an order to complete?
Order Scheduling.answer: It depends on store load and document type—typically within a few hours.

Order Scheduling.question: Can I place recurring orders?
Order Scheduling.answer: Yes, you can automate orders on a weekly or monthly basis.

Order Scheduling.question: Will I get reminders?
Order Scheduling.answer: Yes, we'll notify you when your order is ready or delayed.

Pricing & Payments.question: How much does printing cost?
Pricing & Payments.answer: Prices vary by store, document type, paper quality, and color.

Pricing & Payments.question: Is there a price estimator?
Pricing & Payments.answer: Yes, once you upload the file and choose preferences, you'll see an estimated price.

Pricing & Payments.question: How do I pay?
Pricing & Payments.answer: Through UPI, credit/debit card, or store-specific payment links.

Pricing & Payments.question: Is COD available?
Pricing & Payments.answer: For some stores, yes. You'll see the option during checkout.

Pricing & Payments.question: Can I get an invoice?
Pricing & Payments.answer: Yes, downloadable invoices are available after payment.

Delivery & Pickup.question: Do you deliver?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: Some stores offer delivery; you'll see it listed if available.

Delivery & Pickup.question: Can I track delivery?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: Yes, tracking details will be shared via SMS/email.

Delivery & Pickup.question: What if I miss my delivery?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: The delivery agent will attempt again or you'll be asked to reschedule.

Delivery & Pickup.question: Can I choose pickup instead of delivery?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: Absolutely! You can select a preferred pickup slot at the store.

Delivery & Pickup.question: Are there delivery charges?
Delivery & Pickup.answer: Delivery charges depend on distance and are shown at checkout.

Order Management.question: How do I track my order?
Order Management.answer: Go to “My Orders” and select your order for real-time updates.

Order Management.question: Can I cancel my order?
Order Management.answer: Yes, before printing begins. Post-printing, cancellation isn’t allowed.

Order Management.question: What if my order is incorrect?
Order Management.answer: Contact us via the chatbot or raise a dispute in the order panel.

Order Management.question: Can I reorder the same item?
Order Management.answer: Yes, from your order history, click “Reorder.”

Order Management.question: How long is order history saved?
Order Management.answer: All your past orders are saved for 6 months.

User Account.question: How do I create an account?
User Account.answer: You can sign up with email or mobile number.

User Account.question: How can I update my details?
User Account.answer: Go to your profile and click “Edit Profile.”

User Account.question: I forgot my password. What do I do?
User Account.answer: Use the “Forgot Password” option on the login screen.

User Account.question: Can I login from multiple devices?
User Account.answer: Yes, your account is synced across devices.

Chatbot Help.question: What can this chatbot do?
Chatbot Help.answer: I can help you place orders, track them, answer queries, and escalate issues.

Chatbot Help.question: Can I talk to a human agent?
Chatbot Help.answer: Yes, just type “human support” to connect.

Chatbot Help.question: Are you available 24/7?
Chatbot Help.answer: Yes, the chatbot is available anytime.

Chatbot Help.question: Can I get order updates here?
Chatbot Help.answer: Yes, just ask “What’s the status of my order?”

Chatbot Help.question: Can I upload documents here?
Chatbot Help.answer: Yes, click the upload button in this chat to get started.

Order Customization.question: Can I choose paper quality?
Order Customization.answer: Yes, you can choose from standard, premium, matte, or glossy.

Order Customization.question: Can I print with binding?
Order Customization.answer: Yes, binding options like spiral, staple, or hardcover are available.

Order Customization.question: Do you offer laminations?
Order Customization.answer: Yes, stores that support lamination will show it as an option.

Order Customization.question: Can I choose the number of copies?
Order Customization.answer: Yes, you can select the quantity before placing the order.

Order Customization.question: Can I print in landscape mode?
Order Customization.answer: Yes, choose the page orientation during upload.

Educational Printing.question: Can I print assignments?
Educational Printing.answer: Yes, just upload your document and select your preferences.

Educational Printing.question: Do you offer thesis printing?
Educational Printing.answer: Yes, many stores offer binding and thesis format services.

Educational Printing.question: Are there student discounts?
Educational Printing.answer: Some stores offer student discounts—look for the tag or filter.

Educational Printing.question: Can I print exam papers confidentially?
Educational Printing.answer: Yes, choose a store with a confidentiality tag.

Educational Printing.question: Can I print class notes in bulk?
Educational Printing.answer: Yes, and you can even schedule it as a recurring order.

Business & Corporate Printing.question: Can I print business cards?
Business & Corporate Printing.answer: Yes, upload your design or choose from available templates.

Business & Corporate Printing.question: Do you print brochures?
Business & Corporate Printing.answer: Yes, tri-fold, bi-fold, and other formats are supported.

Business & Corporate Printing.question: Can I print ID cards for my team?
Business & Corporate Printing.answer: Yes, you can upload a CSV and our partners will generate them.

Business & Corporate Printing.question: Do you print invoices or letterheads?
Business & Corporate Printing.answer: Yes, upload your design or get one made through our design add-on.

Business & Corporate Printing.question: Can I place bulk orders for my office?
Business & Corporate Printing.answer: Yes, and you can even get special rates through our corporate plans.

Creative Printing.question: Can I print posters and wall art?
Creative Printing.answer: Yes, you can choose size and paper finish while placing the order.

Creative Printing.question: Do you print photo books?
Creative Printing.answer: Yes, select the layout and upload your photos for a photo album.

Creative Printing.question: Can I print wedding invites or cards?
Creative Printing.answer: Yes, you can upload a design or get it custom-designed.

Creative Printing.question: Do you offer T-shirt or merchandise printing?
Creative Printing.answer: Some stores offer fabric and merchandise printing—use the filter to find them.

Creative Printing.question: Can I print banners or standees?

Technical Troubleshooting.question: My file isn't uploading. What do I do?
Technical Troubleshooting.answer: Check the format and file size. If the problem persists, try another browser or device.

Technical Troubleshooting.question: My document preview is wrong.
Technical Troubleshooting.answer: Please re-upload the file or convert it to PDF for best results.

Technical Troubleshooting.question: Payment failed—what now?
Technical Troubleshooting.answer: Try again or check with your bank. If money was deducted, it will be auto-refunded.

Technical Troubleshooting.question: The site isn’t loading properly.
Technical Troubleshooting.answer: Clear cache or switch to a different browser.

Technical Troubleshooting.question: My file printed with errors.
Technical Troubleshooting.answer: Raise a quality concern from your order dashboard for resolution.

Promotions & Offers.question: Are there any coupons or offers?
Promotions & Offers.answer: Yes, check the “Offers” tab or ask “show me current discounts.”

Promotions & Offers.question: Can I refer friends?
Promotions & Offers.answer: Yes, use your referral link to invite friends and earn credits.

Promotions & Offers.question: Do you have a loyalty program?
Promotions & Offers.answer: Yes, you earn points for every order that can be redeemed later.

Promotions & Offers.question: How can I apply a coupon?
Promotions & Offers.answer: Enter the coupon code at checkout before payment.

Promotions & Offers.question: Where can I see my reward points?

Analytics & Business Insights.question: How can I partner my store with you?
Analytics & Business Insights.answer: Fill out the partner form and our team will contact you.

Analytics & Business Insights.question: Will I get customer insights?
Analytics & Business Insights.answer: Yes, partners get a dashboard with order stats and reviews.

Analytics & Business Insights.question: Can I set my own pricing?
Analytics & Business Insights.answer: Yes, store partners control pricing and services offered.

Analytics & Business Insights.question: Can I disable services temporarily?
Analytics & Business Insights.answer: Yes, use the “Pause store” option in your dashboard.

Analytics & Business Insights.question: Can I customize delivery areas?
Analytics & Business Insights.answer: Yes, define your delivery radius and charges.

Security & Privacy.question: Are my documents private?
Security & Privacy.answer: Yes, all uploads are encrypted and auto-deleted post order.

Security & Privacy.question: Who has access to my files?
Security & Privacy.answer: Only the selected store you place the order with.

Security & Privacy.question: Can I delete files manually?
Security & Privacy.answer: Yes, from your order dashboard → file section.

Security & Privacy.question: Is my payment info saved?
Security & Privacy.answer: No, we use secure third-party payment gateways and don’t store your card details.

Security & Privacy.question: What happens if a store misuses my data?
Security & Privacy.answer: We have strict partner policies. Report the issue immediately.

Feedback & Support.question: How can I give feedback?
Feedback & Support.answer: After your order, you’ll get a prompt to rate the service.

Feedback & Support.question: How do I report a store?
Feedback & Support.answer: Go to the store profile and click “Report” or message “report store” here.

Feedback & Support.question: My issue is unresolved. What now?
Feedback & Support.answer: Type “Escalate” to transfer your case to a senior support agent.

Feedback & Support.question: Can I suggest a feature?
Feedback & Support.answer: We’d love that! Use the “Suggest a Feature” form in the menu.

Feedback & Support.question: How do I reach customer support?
Feedback & Support.answer: Type “talk to support” or email us at support@[yourdomain].com.

Miscellaneous / Smart Features.question: Do you support voice commands?
Miscellaneous / Smart Features.answer: Yes, on mobile you can place voice-enabled orders using our app.

Miscellaneous / Smart Features.question: Can I get notifications via WhatsApp?
Miscellaneous / Smart Features.answer: Yes, just enable WhatsApp updates in settings.

Miscellaneous / Smart Features.question: Is there a mobile app?
Miscellaneous / Smart Features.answer: Yes, available on both iOS and Android.

Miscellaneous / Smart Features.question: Can I schedule printing for future dates?
Miscellaneous / Smart Features.answer: Yes, select a future date/time during the order process.

Miscellaneous / Smart Features.question: Can I use this platform for event or wedding printing needs?
Miscellaneous / Smart Features.answer: Yes, we support bulk, premium, and custom wedding/event printing solutions.
